text: Adubu Paul amadi Barnabas-na thouna phana paokhum pirak-i, â€œEikhoina Tengban Mapugi wa adu nakhoida hanna haiba tabani adubu nakhoina madu loudrabanina nakhoi lomba naidana hingba phangba matik chade haina nasana khanjare. Houjikti eikhoi nakhoibu thadoktuna Jihudi nattaba phurupsingda chatlagani.
